txt.en: 'Will you look at this mess? A salamander, here, right at the gate! These vile serpents grow bolder and bolder of late. Soon they will be crawling into our homes at night and biting us in our sleep!\n\n'There is a nest not far south of Langhold. I suspect you'll find it teeming with these pests. If you go thin their numbers, there will be a good reward in it for you. You carry quite the reputation of being a skilled warrior, [placeholder].'

'Ah, [placeholder]! I am glad to see you back. It looks like you have disposed of a great many of their number, and for that you have the gratitude of Langhold. We are always glad for extra hands, or swords, bows, and the like.'
'That den of salamanders is off south, in the swampy part of the north Wold.'
Salamanders of the swamps near Langhold have begun to encroach upon the edges of the city walls.
Defeat salamanders in the Seething Mire ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Salamanders can be found in plenty in their nest to the south of Langhold, the Seething Mire.\n\nYou should defeat many salamanders at the Seething Mire.
Higbald can be found in Langhold in the northern Wold.\n\nYou should speak with Higbald.
